articles.title: 2025 BYD Sealion 7 lineup detailed for Australia
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: BYD is launching the Sealion 7 this month. The Sealion 7 is positioned as a rival to the Tesla Model Y. It will be an electric alternative to the Sealion 6.

articles.title: Edmonton-made app mirrors rising Canadian amid U.S. tariffs threat
articles.author: CTVNews Edmonton.ca Staff
articles.summary: The 'Shop Canadian' app is now available for download, indicating a new product or service launch.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra vs. S25 and S25 Plus: In-Depth Specs and Features Comparison
articles.author: David Lumb
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced its Galaxy S25 series, consisting of the S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra models, at the Unpacked event in San Jose. All three phones retain the same prices as the S24 family, while introducing new AI features and hardware improvements. The company also revealed a new fourth sibling in the phone generation - Galaxy S25 Edge.

articles.title: Super Bowl advertisers playing it 'safe' and leaning on nostalgia and comedy
articles.author: Dee-ann Durbin
articles.summary: Budweiser is showcasing its Clydesdales in a new Super Bowl ad, while Hellmann's features a reenactment from 'When Harry Met Sally'. Booking.com has the Muppets searching for accommodations, and Instacart's ad includes familiar mascots. Disney explores a world without its iconic characters.

articles.title: IPL extravaganza: Consumer goods cos readying pitch for mega summer splash
articles.author: Ratna Bhushan
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is activating new cross-promotions, and Havmor ice-cream is introducing premium packs specifically for the IPL season to capitalize on the increased consumption during the summer. Reliance Consumer Products picked up pouring rights for IPL teams for its sports drinks. Tata Motors retained title rights for the cricketing event for an additional five years and its Punch EV was the 'official car' for the last edition.

articles.title: Why Tesla's entry into the Philippines could be a win for everyone—even its rivals
articles.author: Sam Millano
articles.summary: Tesla has established its presence in the Philippines, an action expected to catalyze the local EV market.  This introduction of Tesla aims to boost charging infrastructure, encourage supportive government policies, and strengthen competition among EV brands. The anticipation is that Tesla's presence will make the EV market more appealing to consumers.

articles.title: Best Amazon deal: The new Kindle Colorsoft is down to its lowest price ever
articles.author: Lauren Allain
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the new Kindle Colorsoft Signature Edition (32GB) for $229.99, a discount of $50 from its original price of $279.99. This promotion also includes three months of free access to Kindle Unlimited.

articles.title: From the Coin Toss to the Halftime Show: The Old Spice Guy & His No Sweat Predictor Tackle All Your Big Game Questions
articles.summary: Old Spice is launching New Old Spice Total Body Dry Feel Deodorant in Mandarin + Sandalwood and Bourbon + Cherry scents. The new product is available at major retailers nationwide both in stores and online.

articles.title: From the Coin Toss to the Halftime Show: The Old Spice Guy & His No Sweat Predictor Tackle All Your Big Game Questions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Old Spice is promoting its New Old Spice Total Body Dry Feel Deodorant, available in Mandarin + Sandalwood and Bourbon + Cherry scents. The promotion includes Instagram Live streams featuring the Old Spice Guy and No Sweat Predictor, encouraging audience participation. The new deodorant is available at major retailers nationwide.

articles.title: How to get your FREE Starbucks coffee: Super Bowl freebie for everyone on Monday
articles.author: Ben Axelson
articles.summary: Starbucks is launching a promotion offering a free tall hot or iced coffee on February 10, 2025. Customers need to download the Starbucks app and create an account by February 9th or show the app to a barista in-store to redeem the offer. The offer excludes certain coffee types and customizations may incur extra costs.

articles.title: Exciting Growth and New Offerings from Moments
articles.summary: Moments is launching new services to enhance customer experience, including location-specific search options, customizable bulk orders, and subscription services for recurring deliveries of THCA products. The company is also expanding its product lines with innovative options like flavored vapes and pre-rolls. These initiatives aim to improve customer satisfaction and maintain a leading position in the THCA industry.

articles.title: A Conversation With Turo's Matt Kerbel On Branding Being The Mechanism Not The Message, Unlocking Gen Z + The Future Of Creator Marketing
articles.author: Billee Howard
articles.summary: Turo's brand strategy focuses on creating a convenient and enjoyable rental car experience. The company uses cross-company partnerships, research, and creative testing to convey its positioning and build trust with its audience. Turo has partnered with entities like the Jonas Brothers, Netflix's Wednesday, and Michelin Guide and also focuses on co-creating features that support guests in finding the best rental car.

articles.title: Google introduces transparent backgrounds for live captions on android
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Google is introducing an update to its Live Caption feature, providing users with the option to use a transparent background. This new 'Background transparency' option is currently available on newer Pixel devices and is expected to be rolled out to other Android smartphones in the coming months. Google has been actively improving Live Caption with new features, including Expressive Captions, introduced last month.

articles.title: The JTBD Framework: A Better Way To Understand Your B2B Audience
articles.author: Renae Gregoire
articles.summary: The article discusses content creation strategy based on the JTBD (jobs to be done) framework. It utilizes a SaaS marketing automation platform as an example to explain how content should focus on use cases, pain points, KPIs, and triggers for each stage of the buyer's journey. The goal is to guide readers from initial awareness to making a purchase decision for the platform.

articles.title: If You Love A Clean House But Also Identify As Lazy, Here Are 34 Products That Do The Work For You
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff is highlighted as a versatile all-purpose cleaning paste, while Drill Brush attachments provide efficient stain removal for various surfaces. Swiffer PowerMop offers a convenient solution for floor cleaning, and Wet & Forget shower cleaner simplifies grime removal. These products represent introductions or updates to cleaning solutions in the market.

articles.title: Super Bowl ads rely on comedy and nostalgia to avoid potential missteps
articles.author: Dee-ann Durbin
articles.summary: WeatherTech, Little Caesars, Coors Light, and Nestle Coffee Mate have released humorous advertisements. Nestle Coffee Mate's advertisement promotes its new cold foam. Similarly, Häagen-Dazs promotes its ice cream bars with a Super Bowl advertisement featuring the 'Fast and Furious' cast.

articles.title: New Jeans rebrands as NJZ, amid the legal disputes with their label Ador
articles.author: TOI Entertainment Desk
articles.summary: K-pop group New Jeans rebranded to 'NJZ' amid a legal dispute, debuting the rebrand and a new song at ComplexCon Hong Kong from March 21-23. The group members expressed excitement and determination to move forward, despite the challenges and fondness for their previous name.

articles.title: Do it for the Gram: LG opens AI space pop-up for latest notebook
articles.author: 크립토 인사이트
articles.summary: LG Electronics launched the 2025 LG Gram Pro laptop. The laptop features Intel's next-generation Arrow Lake and the older Lunar Lake processors and includes the "LG Gram AI" small language model.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans set for frenzy over Dyson vacuum dupe with two modes – and it's €440 cheaper
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: LIDL Ireland is launching a cordless vacuum cleaner priced at €59.99, a dupe of the Dyson cordless vacuum. It features two suction levels (Boost and ECO), a 600ml dust capacity, and runs for 30-50 minutes. Also, LIDL Ireland is set to sell compact mop priced at €19.99.

articles.title: 38 Simple Products That Make Everyday Life At Home Just A Tad Bit Easier In 2025
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The article showcases a variety of new products available on Amazon, including a garlic chopper, cleaning paste (The Pink Stuff), automatic toilet bowl cleaner, dishwasher cleaning tablets (Affresh), garbage disposal cleaner, motion-activated night lights, an expandable under-sink shelf, and transparent closet dividers. These products aim to simplify household tasks and enhance organization.

articles.title: Chatbots Are Here Now to Help You Learn a Language. I Gave It a Try.
articles.author: Corin Cesaric
articles.summary: ChatGPT and Microsoft Copilot can be used as tools to learn new languages, such as Croatian, offering features like vocabulary assistance, conversation practice, and grammar tips. Experts suggest that AI tools are helpful additions to language learning but are not replacements for real-life teachers, and should be used to supplement lessons.

articles.title: IKEA offers singletons a chance for a free Valentine's Day date in its stores
articles.author: Carlo Simone
articles.summary: IKEA is partnering with dating app Breeze to offer a unique 'first date' experience on Valentine's Day in select stores. Nine lucky couples, matched based on sleep compatibility using IKEA's Six Sleep Essentials, will enjoy a romantic meatball dinner in an IKEA room set. This event promotes IKEA's sleep products and services while offering a novel customer experience.

articles.title: Ninja blender that 'tackles everything from smoothies to cocktails' now at cheapest price
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Ninja 2-in-1 Blender to £98.98, beating Ninja's and Currys' prices. The blender features automatic settings, a 1200W motor, and comes with a jug, cup, and recipe guide. Other blenders, such as the Nutribullet's Blender Combo and the Philips HR2041/01 ProBlend, are also mentioned.

articles.title: AI Chat: How to Use It and What to Know
articles.author: Amanda Smith
articles.summary: Multiple AI chatbots, including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Microsoft Copilot, and Perplexity, are being highlighted for their unique approach to information retrieval and interactive capabilities. The article showcases their functionalities, comparing how they provide answers, assist with work-related tasks, and offer personalized experiences, while also cautioning about potential inaccuracies.

articles.title: How to use tasks and reminders inside ChatGPT
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new feature called 'Tasks' for its ChatGPT service. This feature, initially available in beta to paying subscribers and eventually for everyone, allows users to schedule automated prompts and receive proactive notifications on the web, in mobile apps, and in the macOS desktop app. Tasks can be used for various purposes, such as receiving news briefings or birthday reminders, and they synchronize across devices through the user's ChatGPT account.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Launch May Take Place Soon in India; Know What To Expect
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone in April or May 2025. The phone is anticipated to have an ultra-slim design, an Armour Aluminum frame, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, up to 512GB of storage, and a 200MP main camera. It's also expected to feature a 120Hz LTPO display and run on One UI 7 based on Android 15.

articles.title: CEO TALK: Driven by a passion to deliver value to customers
articles.author: Jomar Mendoza
articles.summary: Friendi Mobile Oman, under the leadership of Shadli Thabit Zahran al Abdul Salam, plans to evolve into a fully digital operator. The company aims to integrate telecom with fintech and other digital services to create a seamless digital ecosystem for customers.

articles.title: Pepsi launches two new flavours and one based on a classic British summer dessert
articles.author: Amelia Stout
articles.summary: Pepsi has launched two new zero-sugar flavors, Cream Soda and Strawberries 'N' Cream Soda, exclusively at Tesco for a limited time.  Carlsberg Britvic describes them as an 'ultimate sweet treat', with a communication plan targeted at Gen Z shoppers.  The company previously launched Pepsi Electric in 2024 and mango-flavored Pepsi Max in 2023.

articles.title: E& UAE unveils Samsung Galaxy S25 Series with unlimited data
articles.author: GCC Business News
articles.summary: e& UAE has announced the availability of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Series, including the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25, for purchase both in-store and online across the UAE. This launch introduces a new line of AI-powered smartphones aimed at enhancing mobile user experience.

articles.title: Little-known Android phone has a mega battery that lasts 20 DAYS – and hidden extra you can only use at night
articles.author: Millie Turner
articles.summary: Doogee has introduced the S200, a rugged smartphone featuring a 10100 mAh battery that can last up to 20 days on standby, a 100MP rear camera with night vision, and a secondary touch screen display. The phone is rated IP68, IP69K, and MIL-STD 810, making it waterproof, dust-proof, and drop-proof up to 1.8 meters.

articles.title: Asus Zenfone 12 Ultra Review: Unboxing, Design, Performance, and AI Features
articles.summary: The Asus Zenfone 12 Ultra is launched with a 6.78-inch flat display and is constructed with a high-quality aluminum frame and matte glass back, available in black and Sakura white. The device runs on Android 15, offering a stock experience with optional Asus customizations, and promises four years of security updates.

articles.title: Sunday house chat
articles.author: Helen Stephens
articles.summary: The Good Ship launched a new podcast episode where they discuss the projects and ideas they discontinued to make room for new ventures.

articles.title: Do it for the Gram: LG opens AI space pop-up for latest notebook
articles.summary: LG Electronics is showcasing its 2025 LG Gram Pro laptop at a pop-up store in Seoul. The laptop features Intel's next-generation Arrow Lake and Lunar Lake processors and incorporates the "LG Gram AI" small language model, derived from LG's Exaone large language model, for on-device AI functionality.

articles.title: Do it for the Gram: LG opens AI space pop-up for latest notebook
articles.summary: LG Electronics launched the 2025 LG Gram Pro laptop, featuring Intel's next-generation Arrow Lake and Lunar Lake processors. The laptop also includes the "LG Gram AI," a small language model developed from LG's Exaone large language model, providing an on-device AI feature. Consumers can experience the new laptop at the "Gram Pro AI Space" pop-up store in Seoul.

articles.title: Kosovë/ Nis procesi i votimit në Mitrovicën e Veriut, komunë e banuar me shumicë serbe
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25, a smartphone featuring next-generation AI, a 3D holographic display, and modular components made from recycled ocean plastics. It also boasts a 200MP quad-pixel camera, is 6G-ready, and utilizes graphene-based batteries.

articles.title: What goes into designing that popular item? Top creators discuss
articles.author: Kim Cook
articles.summary: Whipsaw collaborated with Owala to design the FreeSip water bottle and worked with Tonal on the smart home gym system. Scott Henderson's firm designed the ZShield face shield, Skip Hop Moby spout cover, OXO dustpan, T-Fal measuring spoons, Sunbeam Mixmaster, Chantal kettle and Ravenchord piano. These products represent new designs and innovations in their respective categories.

articles.title: Give the gift of perfect hair this Valentine's Day with Dyson
articles.summary: Dyson has launched a special Red Velvet and Gold edition of its styling tools, including the Airstrait straightener for sleek styling, the Airwrap for versatile looks, the Supersonic Nural hair dryer with intelligent heat control, and the Corrale straightener for cordless styling. These tools are available at Dyson Demo Stores and online at Dyson.in.

articles.title: New Marks and Spencer midi dress is 'comfortable and elegant' and 'perfect for spring summer'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer (M&S) has launched a new Mesh Jersey Midi Column Dress priced at £35. The dress features a regular fit, round neckline, long fitted sleeves, and a camisole lining.

articles.title: An ‘Apostle' of men's skincare: Jamie Melbourne's bold new venture
articles.author: Omar Tomlinson
articles.summary: Apostle, a men's cosmetics brand, launched a flagship product: a tinted moisturizer available in 12 shades. The moisturizer features a Jamaica-inspired formulation, including Blue Mountain water, Scotch bonnet pepper, and sweet orange. Apostle plans to expand with new skincare and hair products.

articles.title: 19 of the best products for teens, according to a beauty expert.
articles.author: Madison Siladi
articles.summary: The article suggests useful beauty products for teenagers at school, including the Wildhood Bounce Clean Deodorant, and Allkinds Keep It Fresh Deodorant. Other suggested products include sunscreens such as La Roche-Posay Anthelios Invisible Fluid Facial Sunscreen SPF 50+, Beauti-fltr Feather Light SPF 50+, and Allkinds Whipped Sunscreen Foam — No Added Fragrance; period underwear like Modibodi Teen Hipster Bikini Moderate-Heavy Black; and hair products from Wet Brush and ELEVEN Australia, along with Allkinds Get Slick Flyaways Wand and the Disco Stick Hair Wax Stick. The list continues with skincare products from tbh Skincare, cleansers from tbh Skincare and Bioderma, and lip balms from Lanolips, Burt's Bees, and elf Cosmetics.

articles.title: 27 Things For Anyone Who Just Doesn't Believe In Checking A Bag
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Away offers water-resistant weekender duffel roomy enough to fit the essentials. Away also sells carry-on luggage designed with a hidden laundry bag, a TSA-approved combination lock, an ejectable battery to charge your ever-dying cell, and 360-degree wheels. Gillette Venus sells mini Gillette Venus razor, so you can shave whilst traveling without having to bring bulky tools.

articles.title: We test three products to ease the effects of cold weather on your hands
articles.author: Beauty Editor
articles.summary: Q+A launched a Collagen hand cream infused with vegetable collagen and hematite. The Body Shop offers a Hemp hand protector providing 96-hour moisture. L'OCCITANE introduced a Shea Butter Intense Hand Balm with extra shea butter and allantoin. Boots relaunched the X Love Island Beauty Box, including products from brands like Fenty, Sol de Janeiro, Elemis and Ouai.

articles.title: We test three products to ease the effects of cold weather on your hands
articles.author: Tara Ledden
articles.summary: Q+A introduced Collagen hand cream, which stimulates collagen and increases the thickness of the epidermis. The Body Shop offers Hemp hand protector, providing 96-hour heavy-duty moisture. L'Occitane launched Shea Butter Intense Hand Balm, enriched with shea butter and allantoin for super-richness and hydration. Boots has released the Boots X Love Island Beauty Box with products from brands like Fenty, Sol de Janeiro, Elemis and Ouai.

articles.title: Survival instinct pushed me to business –Nnamdi Ezeigbo
articles.author: Oghenovo Egodo-Michael
articles.summary: Slot Systems Limited introduced the first dual-sim phone in Nigeria in 2006 through a partnership with Tecno. The company also innovated by introducing a device tracking software, a 'Buy Now, Pay Later' scheme, and a 'Trade In' system allowing customers to trade old phones for new ones with a discount.

articles.title: The Lenovo Legion Go S could have blown the Steam Deck out of the water ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Lenovo's Legion Go, a competitor to the Steam Deck, faces challenges with its Windows 11 implementation. This suggests an initial product launch and evaluation phase.

articles.title: I'm skipping the Plus and Ultra - here's why the standard Galaxy S25 is my ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: The Galaxy S25 is presented as a worthwhile upgrade from the S24, suggesting a new or updated product from Samsung.

articles.title: I haven't always liked Razer's gaming headsets, but the Barracuda X Chroma finally offers good ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Razer's Barracuda X Chroma headset is being evaluated. The article questions whether the product lives up to expectations given its price point, implying a new product launch or recent availability.

articles.title: Samsung Is Emailing Galaxy S25 Buyers A New Offer
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25. The launch includes a new discount promo code.
